testCases.query: Create a custom button component with CVA variants and OKLCH theming
expectedBehavior: Uses CVA for type-safe variant definitions
Uses cn() utility for class merging without Tailwind conflicts
OKLCH color variables for perceptually uniform theming
Component extension wraps original without modifying source

testCases.query: Build a form with shadcn Input, Label, and validation error states
expectedBehavior: FormField wrapper associates Label with Input via htmlFor
Error state uses aria-invalid and aria-describedby
Uses cn() for conditional error border styling
Integrates with react-hook-form Controller or register

testCases.query: Create a sortable data table with shadcn and TanStack Table
expectedBehavior: Uses TanStack Table useReactTable for state management
Column definitions use accessorKey with header render functions
Sorting toggles via header click with visual indicator
Pagination controls use shadcn Button components

testCases.query: Implement a confirmation dialog for a destructive action
expectedBehavior: Uses AlertDialog (not Dialog) for destructive confirmations
Has Dialog.Title and Dialog.Description for accessibility
Cancel and Action buttons with proper variant styling
Focus trapped within dialog, returns to trigger on close

testCases.query: Create a button that is also a link using asChild composition
expectedBehavior: Uses asChild prop to render Link as the button element
Child component forwards refs with React.forwardRef
Props and event handlers merge correctly via Slot
No extra wrapper div in the DOM output

testCases.query: Style a dropdown menu with Tailwind data-attribute variants
expectedBehavior: Uses data-[state=open] for open/close animations
Uses data-[side=*] for position-aware slide animations
Focus styles use data-[highlighted] or focus:bg-accent
Disabled items use data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none
